def-en: A function that takes a pair of data points as input (for example, to compare them).
def-ga: Feidhm a bhfuil péire pointí sonraí mar ionchur aici (chun iad a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile, mar shampla).

prov.pointe: féach ar an téarma 'pointwise function / feidhm de phointe'

notes: Féach ar an téarma 'pointwise function / feidhm de phointe'.
